name: Lost Balloon (Dodorex)
description:
A little girl looses her balloon in a creepy restroom.  You see her crying and decide to go in ther and get the balloon for her.  But thing are more complicated than you thought.  Will you survive?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Move:     W , A , S , D

-top bar is your health

-bottom one it the ammount of water you have left

-survive by drinking water from sinks and other things but not all water is clean

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

P.s.  Hi, just wanted to note that this game was made spontaneously. But if it entertains you for a few minutes than i'm happy.
